description: The anime imagines if Japanese historical figures such as Queen Himiko, the warlord Oda Nobunaga, and samurai Sakamoto Ryouma were cats.

REGULAR.description:
Rice is a staple food in Japan for a reason, and the ones who helped make that fact a reality are the Yayoi cats from over 2000 years ago. See how they helped cultivate the food that would go on to be the core of the Japanese diet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Have a Harvest, Yayoi Cats!
Mezase Housaku, Yayoijin!
めざせ豊作, 弥生人!

REGULAR.description:
Uesugi Kenshin was one of the fiercest cats of the Sengoku period, and regarded as the incarnation of the war god, Bishamonten. Find out how he managed to go from being sent to a temple as his siblings took control of their clan to the ruler of Echigo province in this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everybody Loves Uesugi Kenshin! The Story of Bishamonten
Minna Daisuki, Uesugi Kenshin! Bishamonten Hen
みんな大好き, 上杉謙信! ~毘沙門天編~

REGULAR.description:
The Heian period was marked by the dominance of the imperial court, but Japan is known as the samurai country for a reason. Find out why by watching Taira no Kiyomori improve the standing of the military class.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taira no Kiyomori, Bushi de Aru!
Taira no Kiyomori, the Samurai!
平清盛, 武士である!

REGULAR.description:
The peace of the Edo period brought a resurgence of the arts, and among them was the form of poetry known as haiku. This episode shines/ a spotlight on the master / Matsuo Basho.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Journey Onward, Matsuo Basho!
Tabi Yukeba, Matsuo Bashou!
旅ゆけば, 松尾芭蕉!

REGULAR.description:
Japan might be an island, but that doesn`t mean they`re completely isolated from foreign hostility. This episode features the tale of how Hojo Tokimune managed to fend off Kublai Khan`s attempts to reach Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Counter-Attack, Hojo Tokimune!
Mukaeute, Houjou Tokimune!
迎え撃て, 北条時宗!

REGULAR.description:
In the twilight of the Tokugawa shogunate, the 13th shogun Iesada had a fragile constitution. In hopes of ensuring a sturdier heir, he ends up marrying the feisty and hearty daughter of the Shimazu clan, Atsuhime!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakumatsu no God Nee-chan, Atsu-hime!
The Bakumatsu`s Godly Sister! Atsuhime!
幕末のゴッド姉ちゃん, 篤姫!

REGULAR.description:
During the Heian period, the imperial court was on top and the warrior class served as their leisure. But there was one cat who challenged that status quo: Taira no Masakado!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hangyaku no Collector, Taira no Masakado!
The Rebellious Collector, Taira no Masakado!
反逆のコレクター, 平将門!

REGULAR.description:
Centuries after they were first introduced to Japan, very few people were left in the country who properly knew how to spread the teachings of Buddha. This episode tells the story of envoys who travelled to Tang China to help restore the legitimacy of Buddhism in Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Go, Envoys!
Sore Ike, Kentoushi!
それいけ, 遣唐使!

REGULAR.description:
The Shinsengumi were founded to keep peace in Kyoto, and for a good reason. With the rise of the Sat-Cho Alliance and their efforts to bring down the the shogunate, the fighting force in blue haoris are going to have their hands full.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinsengumi, Daikonran Hen!
The Shinsengumi: A Story of Chaos!
新選組, 大混乱編!

REGULAR.description:
Japan`s Edo period and the European Renaissance were seperated by hundreds of years. But in spite of that, there was a cat in Edo Japan who fit the definition of "renaissance man": the scholar, inventor, and artist known as Hiraga Gennai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chouzetsu Multi Creator Cat: Hiraga Gennai!
The Supremely Multi-Talented Creator Cat, Hiraga Gennai!
超絶マルチクリエイターキャット 平賀源内!

REGULAR.description:
Imagawa Yoshitomo rose to eminence in the days of the Sengoku period, and while he might be most famous for his defeat at the hands of Oda Nobunaga at Okehazama, this episode will explain why exactly it was so impressive that the warlord from Owari was able to take down this highly regarded veteran.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He`s Pretty Good, That Imagawa Yoshimoto!
Kekkou Yari Te, Imagawa Yoshimoto!
けっこうやり手, 今川義元!

REGULAR.description:
Education is an important part of every revolutionary`s development, and prior to the Bakumatsu, there was one cat who teaching the principles that would go on to inspire a generation of rebels: Yoshida Shoin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hamidachi Sensei, Yoshida Shouin!
The Wildcard Educator, Yoshida Shoin!
はみだし先生, 吉田松陰!

REGULAR.description:
The dragon of Echigo, Uesugi Kenshin, was considered many things, from the nemesis of Takeda Shingen, the incarnation of the war god Bishamonten. This episode features some of the stories that made him so famous, to the point where even Oda Nobunaga knew to fear him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everybody Loves Uesugi Kenshin! The Story of the Cutest Dragon Ever
Minna Daisuki, Uesugi Kenshin! Saikyou ni Kawaii Ryuu Hen
みんな大好き, 上杉謙信! ~最強にかわいい龍編~

REGULAR.description:
It`s been said that government is like fire; too much and you burn everything down, too little and you might freeze to death. With Prince Shotoku`s passing, the imperial court in Japan has started to get a little fire-y, so it`s up to some determined cats to reign it in with the Taika reform.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iza, Taika no Kaishin!
Now, Let the Taika Reform Begin!
いざ, 大化の改新!

REGULAR.description:
It`s time to head on down to western Honshu to visit the Chugoku region amid the fires of the Sengoku wars. After finding himself in charge of his his clan`s domain, Mori Motonari is forced to use wits to overcome his disadvantageous position.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Marutto Matomete, Mouri Motonari!
Rounding Up the Well-Rounded Mori Motonari!
まるっとまとめて, 毛利元就!

REGULAR.description:
With the arrival of Admiral Perry, Japan`s long period of isolationist policy was nearly at an end. Learn all about the diplomatic encounter that eventually resulted in the the overthrow of the Tokugawa shogunate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Congratulations?! Kitty Cat Japan Opens Up!
Iwai!? Neko Neko Nihon, Kaikoku!
祝!? ねこねこ日本, 開国!

REGULAR.description:
Balance is an important part of maintaining a productive life, even when you`re waging a battle against rival daimyo to unite Japan. Find all about the master of the tea ceremony that all the Sengoku era`s greatest generals turned to for guidance, Sen no Rikyu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cha Cha Cha no Rikyuu!
Time to Tea Off with Rikyu!
チャチャチャの利休!

REGULAR.description:
The Muromachi period was only three decades in, but things weren`t looking good. Beef between rivals claimants to the imperial throne and regional daimyo was causing a grim outlook... until Ashikaga Yoshimitsu became shogun and started sorting out their problems!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ashikaga Yoshimitsu, Muchakucha Zekkouchou!
Things Are Turning Out Great for Ashikaga Yoshimitsu!
足利義満, むちゃくちゃゼッコーチョー!

REGULAR.description:
After the fall of the Tokugawa shogunate and the dissolution of the Shinsengumi, Hijikata Toshizo was still ready and willing to fight. This episode features the Shinsengumi`s demonic disciplinarian and how he resisted the Meiji government after the war was over.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oni no Hijikata Toshizou, Kita e Mukau!
The Demon Hijikata Toshizo Heads North!
鬼の土方歳三, 北へ向かう!

REGULAR.description:
Saito Dosan was mean enough to be considered a viper, and that`s during an era of ceaseless warfare between rival feudal daimyo. But for all his ruthlessness, the viper of Mino would still find himself among even more infamous company... when he became the father-in-law of Oda Nobunaga!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu Mamushi Otoko, Saitou Dousan!
The Fearsome Viper, Saito Dosan!
恐怖マムシ男, 斎藤道三!

REGULAR.description:
With the country slowly opening up to foreign influence, the study of rangaku--imported knowledge from the Netherlands--provided by be a source of inspiration that would result in major revolutions in Japanese medicine. And at the center of it all was the medicine-minded cat, Sugita Genpaku!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ra Ra Rangaku, Sugita Genpaku!
Trala-rangaku! Sugita Genpaku!
ラ・ラ・蘭学, 杉田玄白!

REGULAR.description:
A samurai from Choshu, the musically minded Takasugi Shinsaku found himself opposed to the Tokugawa shogunate`s weak stance against foreign intervention, and eventually became a critical part in the rebellion that sought to restore the Emperor to power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatenkou Singer, Takasugi Shinsaku! Hatenkou Do Jo no Kuchi Hen
The Unparalleled Singer, Takasugi Shinsaku! The Rise of a Star
破天荒シンガー, 高杉晋作! ~破天荒度序の口編~

REGULAR.description:
Raised by the fierce lady daimyo Ii Naotora, Ii Naomasa would eventually become famous in the service of Tokugawa Ieyasu, helping the commander from Mikawa eventually unify all of Japan
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ike Ike Ichiban, Ii Naomasa!
You`re the Best Around, Ii Naomasa!
行け行け一番, 井伊直政!

REGULAR.description:
You might love love, but do you love it enough to wear a giant "LOVE" on the helmet you wear into combat? Because that`s what the trusted Uesugi commander, Naoe Kanetsugu, was famous for!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sengoku Ai Sare Kei Deshi, Naoe Kanetsugu!
The Sengoku Period`s Most Lovable Guy, Naoe Kanetsugu!
戦国・愛され系男子, 直江兼続!

REGULAR.description:
It`s hard being the daughter of a Sengoku daimyo; you could end up being held hostage, married off for political concerns, or any other ignominious fates. And it`s even more difficult when you`re Hosokawa Gracia, the daughter of the infamous traitor, Akechi Mitsuhide!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Tough Being a Girl During the Sengoku, Hosokawa Gracia!
Sengoku no Onna wa Tsurai yo, Hosokawa Gracia!
戦国の女はつらいよ, 細川ガラシャ!

REGULAR.description:
Working as a diplomat has always been hard, but the further back in history you travel, the tougher it is to even travel internationally.  In spite having served during the 8th Century, Abe no Nakamaro managed to successfully manage hist post in Tang China.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abe no Nakamaro Hates Boats!
Fune Daikirai, Abe no Nakamaro!
船だいきらい, 阿倍仲麻呂!

REGULAR.description:
Slow and steady wins the race, and sometimes, it helps build a country. See how Ninomiya Kinjiro`s dilligence helped set the stage an example for 1800s Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kotsukotsu Ugoku, Ninomiya Kinjiro!
Step-by-Step Progress, Ninomiya Kinjiro!
コツコツ働く, 二宮金次郎!

REGULAR.description:
How did Mount Fuji become the single most iconic geographic feature of Japan? It probably has a little bit to do with the master ukiyo-e artist who had a fixation on the big blue beauty, Katsushika Hokusai!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Katsushika Hokusai Paints His Heart Out!
Katsushika Hokusai, Kakimakuru!
葛飾北斎, 描きまくる!

REGULAR.description:
Any child with busy parents could use a good nanny. Luckily for future shogun Tokugawa Iemitsu, his nanny is the shrewd, strong, and steadyfast Lady Kasuga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kasuga no Tsubone wa Moete Iru!
Lady Kasuga Is on Fire!
春日局は燃えている!

REGULAR.description:
Behind every great historical figure, there are countless individuals working to help make their ambitions a reality. And behind long shadow cast by Toyotomi Hideyoshi was his tactical genius, Takenaka Hanbei!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here Is the Military Genius, Takenaka Hanbei!
Tensai Gunshi Takenaka Hanbee, Koko ni Ari!
天才軍師・竹中半兵衛, ここにあり!

REGULAR.description:
The children of the tragic marriage between Azai Nagamasa and Oda Nobunaga`s sister went on to have memorable lives. But "memorable" can often mean the same thing as "troubled" in Sengoku Japan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: GOGO江! ~われらは浅井三姉妹~
Go Go Gou! Warera wa Azai Sanshimai
Go Go, Go! We Are the Three Azai Sisters!

REGULAR.description:
As the Joi movement built momentum, Takasugi Shinsaku is ready to fight for his home province of Choshuu. With his Kiheitai militia, the singing revolutionary takes on the Tokugawa shogunate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatenkou Singer, Takasugi Shinsaku! Hatenkou Do Max Hen
The Unparalleled Singer, Takasugi Shinsaku! Days of Max. Unaparalleledry!
破天荒シンガー, 高杉晋作! ~破天荒度MAX編~
Neko Neko Nihonshi (2017)
Meow Meow Japanese History (2017)
ねこねこ日本史 (2017)
猫猫日本史 第二季
